channel.title: Grindersbox Yap!
channel.itunes:author: Michael wilhelm
channel.description: Get the latest on Technology and learn something in the process! Every episode has a special guest that is a guru in some kind of technology, with your host Michael Wilhelm Check out our website for more information at grindersbox.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: Grinders Tech Talk is not just another tech news show but we try to teach you someting in the process. Visit our website grindersbox.com
channel.itunes:summary: Get the latest on Technology and learn something in the process! Every episode has a special guest that is a guru in some kind of technology, with your host Michael Wilhelm Check out our website for more information at grindersbox.com
